name: Activity Feed Redesign
description: Three approaches to improving the fundraising activity feed: Enhanced Timeline (richer rows with icon containers), Signal Cards (Deel-inspired notification cards), Investor-grouped (ClickUp-inspired entity clustering).

versions.notes: Enhanced Timeline — chronological rows with icon containers, colored by event type
Signal Cards — Deel-inspired elevated cards with category filters and date range picker
Investor-grouped — ClickUp-inspired entity cards clustering activities under each investor
Investor-grouped + colored icon containers (V3 layout with V1's event-type color coding)
Individual-level activities — person names as leading element, multiple people per firm visible
